description.plain: The lead singer Lillie West (lead singer/guitar) was raised in London and moved to Los Angeles when she was a teenager. She moved from London to L.A as a teenager and then to Chicago to attend the Chicago Institute of Art. The only her members of the band are Emily Kempf on bass/backup vocals and Ben Leach on drums,he also does the musical arrangements. The just got done (7/9/19)touring with Death Cab For Cutie. Lala Lala’s record label Hardly Art is an imprint of the famous Sub Pop label.  Death Cab For Cutie’s first three albums were for Sub Pop imprint Barsuk.
